project.name: C-C822A-GIMP-02-ST03-DT06-DF13-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C822A-GIMP-02-ST03-DT06-DF13-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Good inputs:1) environement variable is set to a value whose length mod 3 is 0 or 1Bad inputs:1) environment variable is not set2) environment variable is set to a value whose length mod 3 is not 0 or 1

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
